title: Health Bestie App
description: An app helps users lead a healthier lifestyle. Nutrition and sleep are crucial for well-being and health.

title: Sudoku-Solver
description: A program that automatically solves Sudoku puzzles, ensuring that all rows, columns, and subgrids contain all the numbers from 1 to 9 without repetition.

title: You-vs-Will Game
description: How many unique words that William Shakespeare used to write 'Romeo and Juliet' can you remember in one minute?

title: Video Assistant
description: A basic website program designed to enhance videos.
